articles.title: How to teach children about climate change, inspire hope and take action to change the future
articles.author: Anonymous
articles.excerpt: Some children and youth find the effects of climate change are traumatic. Taking a trauma-informed approach to education can nurture resilience.
articles.summary: Some children and youth find the effects of climate change are traumatic. Taking a trauma-informed approach to education can nurture resilience.

articles.title: Businesses ‘more concerned than ever'
articles.author: Anonymous
articles.excerpt: Australian business leaders are more concerned about climate change than ever before, with a new report finding there has been a significant shift in opinion in just eight months.
articles.summary: Australian business leaders are more concerned about climate change than ever before, with a new report finding there has been a significant shift in opinion in just eight months.

articles.title: Invasion of cats changes weather
articles.excerpt: After 5000 magic cats moved to Rome they changed the weather to be slightly cooler.
articles.summary: A invasion of 5000 magic cats changes the weather in Rome.

articles.title: Invasion of sparrows turns weather back to normal
articles.excerpt: The weather change caused by an invasion of magic cats was undone by an invasion of magic sparrows.
articles.summary: The weather change caused by an invasion of magic cats was undone by an invasion of magic sparrows.
